sentences.en: A small colour television was tuned to an afternoon soap opera.
sentences.cn: 一台小彩色电视机频道调在了一出下午的肥皂剧上。

sentences.en: He bought a bar of soap.
He had soap suds in his ears.
Metal, oil and soap contains foreign matter, respectively.
sentences.cn: 金属 、 油和肥皂中分别含有杂质.

sentences.en: She did out the bathroom with lots of soap and hot water.
sentences.cn: 她用了大量肥皂和热水打扫浴室.

sentences.en: She smelled strongly of carbolic soap.
sentences.cn: 她身上有股浓烈的石炭酸皂的味道。

sentences.en: Soap is not the only cleansing agent.
sentences.cn: 肥皂并不是唯一的清洁剂.

sentences.en: They needed a writer with some enthusiasm. No soap.
sentences.cn: 他们需要一个有些激情的作家。不可能。

sentences.en: This cake of soap will last you about several weeks.
sentences.cn: 这块肥皂大约够你用几个星期.

sentences.en: This toilet soap lathers so nicely and has several fragrances.
sentences.cn: 这种香皂起泡很多,并且有好几种香味.

sentences.en: Wash the feet, underarms and body surface using a soap.
sentences.cn: 用肥皂洗洗脚、腋下及全身。

sentences.en: Wash thoroughly with soap and water .
sentences.cn: 用肥皂和水彻底洗一洗。

sentences.en: Wash your face thoroughly with a mild soap and warm water.
sentences.cn: 用刺激性不强的肥皂和热水把脸彻底洗干净。

sentences.en: Wash your hands well with soap.
With soap and water, bubbles and boats, children love bathtime.
sentences.cn: 有了肥皂、水、泡泡和小船，孩子们都喜欢洗澡。

sentences.en: You'd better ring for the housekeeper to bring more soap.
sentences.cn: 你最好按铃叫女管家再拿点肥皂来.

words.tran_cn: 涂着肥皂的；含有肥皂的；似肥皂的；圆滑的

phrases.tran_cn: 液体肥皂；洗手液；肥皂溶液
肥皂泡；美丽而又短暂虚幻的事物
肥皂厂，肥皂制造厂；合成纤维厂
肥皂剧（以家庭问题为题材的广播或电视连续剧）

trans.tran_cn: 肥皂，肥皂剧，[化]皂，脂肪酸盐
trans.tran_en: the substance that you use to wash your body

trans.tran_cn: 将肥皂涂在……上；对……拍马屁（俚语）
trans.tran_en: to rub soap on or over someone or something

trans.tran_cn: 抹肥皂，用肥皂擦洗，<俚>拍…的马屁，吹捧（某人）
